feedback.fit: The cropped jacket and high-waisted shorts create a balanced, flattering silhouette. The relaxed fit is perfect for a casual look.
feedback.color: The primarily black outfit with pops of blue denim and brown leather accessories is a classic, versatile color combination.
feedback.footwear: The black ankle boots complement the edgy vibe of the outfit while being comfortable for all-day wear.
feedback.accessories: The cognac leather tote adds a nice contrast to the black and blue outfit. Minimal accessories keep the look uncluttered.
feedback.style: This outfit nails edgy casual style. It's fashionable yet functional for a variety of casual weekend activities.

feedback.fit: The fitted jacket and skinny jeans create a sleek, streamlined silhouette that is very flattering.
feedback.color: The bright pink jacket really pops against the neutral gray and black, adding a fun, bold element.
feedback.footwear: The peep-toe heels dress up the look compared to flats or sneakers. However, they may not be the most practical for long periods of casual wear.
feedback.accessories: The black bag and sunglasses coordinate well without competing with the statement jacket.
feedback.style: This outfit makes a bold statement with the hot pink while still maintaining an overall casual chic vibe, appropriate for social gatherings.

feedback.fit: The flowy blouse and relaxed shorts are breezy and comfortable for hot weather. The belted waist adds some definition.
feedback.color: The soft floral print in pinks and greens is pretty and perfect for summer. It pairs nicely with the cognac brown shorts.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals elongate the legs while being more walkable than stilettos. They tie in with the shorts beautifully.
feedback.accessories: The straw hat and turquoise bag scream summer fun. They add pops of interest to the outfit.
feedback.style: This is a quintessential cute summer look. It's stylish yet effortless and suited for many casual warm weather occasions.

feedback.fit: The loose, boxy fit of the button-down contrasts with the fitted high-waisted shorts. Front-tucking the shirt could improve the proportions.
feedback.color: The white and olive green color scheme is fresh and appropriate for daytime casual wear. The cognac accessories add warmth.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges work well with the outfit's color palette and add a touch of polish to an otherwise very casual look.
feedback.accessories: The brown leather belt coordinates with the shoes and defines the waist. Simple gold jewelry or a watch could also elevate this basic outfit.
feedback.style: This look channels a preppy casual vibe. A few small tweaks, like a front tuck and cuffed sleeves, could take it to the next level.

labels.fit: Fitted on top, loose on bottom

feedback.fit: The fitted tank top balances the looser, flowy shorts. However, the shorts overwhelm the frame a bit and could be more flattering if they were slightly shorter.
feedback.color: The gray and red color combination is okay but not particularly inspiring or coordinated. The white shoes feel disconnected.
feedback.footwear: The white wedge sandals are cute but don't really tie in with the rest of the outfit's color scheme.
feedback.accessories: The black sunglasses are a nice basic accessory but the look could be elevated with the addition of jewelry, a belt, or a handbag.
feedback.style: This outfit is very simple and casual. It's fine for running errands but lacks styling details that would make it more fashionable and intentional.

feedback.fit: The peplum top accentuates the waist and creates an hourglass silhouette. The skinny jeans show off the legs. The overall tailored fit is very flattering.
feedback.color: The vibrant purple top really pops against the black jeans for a bold yet coordinated look.
feedback.footwear: The black and white wedges add visual interest and elongate the legs. They also tie in nicely with the black jeans.
feedback.accessories: The silver statement necklace and black sunglasses are the perfect glam additions to dress up this look.
feedback.style: This outfit nails dressy casual, perfect for events or a night out. The peplum top and accessories elevate it beyond standard casual wear.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the tee and shorts is easygoing and appropriate for casual summer days. Rolling the shorts once or twice could improve the proportions.
feedback.color: The bright orange tee is fun and eye-catching. However, the red bag clashes a bit. A neutral bag would allow the orange to really shine.
feedback.footwear: The studded black sandals add a nice edge to contrast the laid-back tee and shorts. They also ground the bright colors.
feedback.accessories: The straw fedora is a cute summer accessory that dresses up the basic tee and shorts. As mentioned, a neutral bag in black, cognac, or tan would improve the color story.
feedback.style: This look is casual with an eclectic, slightly boho twist thanks to the bright colors and hat. With a bag swap it would be a great summer weekend look.

feedback.fit: The loose chambray shirt and fitted denim shorts create a nice juxtaposition. The rolled sleeves and front tuck are styling details that elevate the look.
feedback.color: Different shades of blue denim are paired together for a cool monochromatic effect. The tan sandals are the perfect neutral complement.
feedback.footwear: The tan and orange wedges add a pop of color and interest to the bottom of the outfit. The wedge style dresses up the casual denim.
feedback.accessories: The look is clean and simple with no visible accessories. A long pendant necklace and/or a cognac leather tote would be chic additions.
feedback.style: This outfit exemplifies classic casual style. Denim on denim is always chic, and the styling of the shirt takes it up a notch. It's perfect for many casual occasions.

feedback.fit: The oversized graphic tee is trendy but borders on sloppy untucked over the shorts. A French tuck could make it look more intentional.
feedback.color: The white, blue and brown color scheme is classic and neutral. The colors all work harmoniously together.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges pair nicely with the blue denim shorts and help elongate the legs since a lot of skin isn't showing.
feedback.accessories: The silver statement necklace dresses up the basic tee and shorts combo. Stacked bracelets would also be a nice addition.
feedback.style: This is a good example of how to style a graphic tee for a casual summer look. A few small tweaks like a French tuck could elevate it further.

feedback.fit: The slightly oversized blazer juxtaposed with fitted shorts creates an interesting play on proportions. The cuffed sleeves show it's intentional.
feedback.color: The pastel pink blazer makes a statement against the black and white basics. It's a chic, feminine color palette.
feedback.footwear: The black peep-toe heels elongate the legs and dress up the shorts. They coordinate perfectly with the black denim.
feedback.accessories: The black sunglasses are a chic addition. A black leather clutch or crossbody bag would complete the look nicely.
feedback.style: This outfit nails polished casual. The blazer elevates the basic shorts look to something more fashion-forward and appropriate for many occasions.
